name: Allah
description: The name of the One True God, the Proper Name of the Divine Being. This name encompasses all divine attributes and is considered the greatest and most comprehensive of all Allah's names.

name: Ar-Rahman
description: The one whose mercy encompasses all of creation, extending to every living being regardless of faith or deed. This mercy is universal and unconditional in this life.

name: Ar-Raheem
description: The one who shows special mercy to the believers, particularly in the hereafter. This mercy is specific and reserved for those who believe and do good deeds.

name: Al-Malik
description: The absolute ruler and owner of all creation, whose sovereignty and authority are complete and eternal.

name: Al-Quddus
description: The one who is pure and free from any imperfection, defect, or deficiency. The absolutely pure without any blemish.

name: As-Salam
description: The one who is perfect in every way and free from any defects or flaws. The source of all peace and safety.

name: Al-Mu'min
description: The one who provides security and confirms the truth of His promises. The giver of peace and security.

name: Al-Muhaymin
description: The one who watches over and protects all things. The guardian and witness over all creation.

name: Al-Aziz
description: The one who is mighty and invincible. The powerful one who overcomes all.

name: Al-Jabbar
description: The one who repairs, improves, and makes things right. The supreme and irresistible.

name: Al-Mutakabbir
description: The one who is supreme in glory, greatness, and majesty. The one who demonstrates His greatness in all things.

name: Al-Khaliq
description: The one who brings things into existence from nothingness. The creator who has the power to design and create all things.

name: Al-Bari
description: The one who creates in perfect proportion and harmony. The maker who creates with no preexisting model.

name: Al-Musawwir
description: The one who forms and shapes all things, giving them their unique characteristics and features.

name: Al-Ghaffar
description: The one who forgives again and again. The ever-forgiving who accepts repentance and pardons repeatedly.

name: Al-Qahhar
description: The one who prevails over all things. The dominator who has absolute power over all creation.

name: Al-Wahhab
description: The one who gives freely without any return. The bestower who gives unconditionally.

name: Ar-Razzaq
description: The one who provides all sustenance. The sustainer who provides all creatures with what they need.

name: Al-Fattah
description: The one who opens the way to victory and success. The opener of closed doors and remover of obstacles.

name: Al-Alim
description: The one who knows all things, hidden or apparent, past, present and future.

name: Al-Qabid
description: The one who constricts and withholds. The one who restricts provision according to wisdom.

name: Al-Basit
description: The one who releases, enlarges and expands. The one who increases provision for whom He wills.

name: Al-Khafid
description: The one who lowers and diminishes. The one who brings down those who deserve to be brought down.

name: Ar-Rafi
description: The one who raises and elevates. The one who exalts in honor whom He wills.

name: Al-Muizz
description: The one who gives honor and dignity. The one who bestows respect and esteem.

name: Al-Mudhill
description: The one who humiliates and degrades. The one who brings low those who deserve to be brought low.

name: As-Sami
description: The one who hears all things, even the most quiet or secret of sounds.

name: Al-Basir
description: The one who sees all things, even what is hidden or in darkness.

name: Al-Hakam
description: The one who judges and gives verdict. The ultimate judge whose decisions are wise and just.

name: Al-Adl
description: The one who is absolutely just in all dealings. The embodiment of perfect justice.

name: Al-Latif
description: The one who is gentle and subtle in actions. The most gracious who knows the finest details.

name: Al-Khabir
description: The one who is fully aware of all things. The one who has full knowledge of the inner nature of all things.

name: Al-Halim
description: The one who is clement and patient. The most forbearing who delays punishment of the wrongdoer.

name: Al-Azim
description: The one who is mighty and magnificent. The possessor of absolute greatness.

name: Al-Ghafur
description: The one who forgives extensively. The most forgiving who covers and forgives sins repeatedly.

name: Ash-Shakur
description: The one who appreciates and multiplies rewards. The most thankful who rewards abundantly.

name: Al-Ali
description: The one who is transcendently high. The highest, above whom there is nothing.

name: Al-Kabir
description: The one who is greater than all. The most great who is greater than everything in all aspects.

name: Al-Hafiz
description: The one who preserves and protects all things. The guardian who never neglects.

name: Al-Muqit
description: The one who creates and maintains all means of nourishment. The sustainer of all things.

name: Al-Hasib
description: The one who keeps account of all things. The sufficient one who takes care of all needs.

name: Al-Jalil
description: The one who possesses absolute majesty. The sublime one of ultimate glory.

name: Al-Karim
description: The one who is generous and gives abundantly. The most generous who gives without limit.

name: Ar-Raqib
description: The one who watches over and observes all things. The vigilant who never sleeps.

name: Al-Mujib
description: The one who responds to all supplications. The answerer of prayers and fulfiller of needs.

name: Al-Wasi
description: The one whose knowledge and mercy encompasses all things. The vast and boundless.

name: Al-Hakim
description: The one who is perfectly wise in all things. The source of all wisdom.

name: Al-Wadud
description: The one who is full of love and kindness. The most affectionate to His creation.

name: Al-Majid
description: The one who is most glorious and noble. The possessor of perfect glory and honor.

name: Al-Baith
description: The one who brings the dead to life. The awakener who resurrects for accountability.

name: Ash-Shahid
description: The one who witnesses all things. The ever-present witness to all things.

name: Al-Haqq
description: The one who is the absolute truth. The embodiment and source of all truth.

name: Al-Wakil
description: The one who can be trusted in all affairs. The ultimate trustee and guardian.

name: Al-Qawi
description: The one who possesses all strength. The possessor of complete and perfect power.

name: Al-Matin
description: The one who is firm and unshakeable. The possessor of extreme strength.

name: Al-Wali
description: The one who supports and protects. The guardian and helper of the believers.

name: Al-Hamid
description: The one who deserves all praise. The praised one whose glorification is established.

name: Al-Muhsi
description: The one who knows the number of all things. The calculator who encompasses everything in counting.

name: Al-Mubdi
description: The one who creates from nothing. The initiator of all things.

name: Al-Muid
description: The one who brings back to existence. The recreator who restores what was destroyed.

name: Al-Muhyi
description: The one who gives life. The one who brings the dead to life.

name: Al-Mumit
description: The one who causes death. The taker of life at the appointed time.

name: Al-Hayy
description: The one who is eternally alive. The living one who never dies.

name: Al-Qayyum
description: The one who sustains everything. The self-subsisting upon whom all depend.

name: Al-Wajid
description: The one who finds what He seeks. The perceiver who finds everything He wants.

name: Al-Majid
description: The one who is most glorious. The possessor of glory and honor.

name: Al-Wahid
description: The one who is unique and single. The one who has no partners or equals.

name: Al-Ahad
description: The one who is absolutely unique. The one and only, indivisible.

name: As-Samad
description: The one upon whom all depend. The eternal refuge who is independent of all needs.

name: Al-Qadir
description: The one who has power over all things. The able one who can do anything.

name: Al-Muqtadir
description: The one who has absolute power. The determiner who has power over all things.

name: Al-Muqaddim
description: The one who brings forward. The promoter who brings whom He wills forward.

name: Al-Muakhkhir
description: The one who leaves behind. The postponer who puts whom He wills last.

name: Al-Awwal
description: The one who is first. The first before whom there is nothing.

name: Al-Akhir
description: The one who is last. The last after whom there is nothing.

name: Az-Zahir
description: The one who is apparent. The outward who is evident through His signs.

name: Al-Batin
description: The one who is hidden. The inward whose essence cannot be comprehended.

name: Al-Wali
description: The one who governs and manages all affairs. The patron who supports and guides.

name: Al-Muta'ali
description: The one who is supremely transcendent. The most high who is above creation.

name: Al-Barr
description: The one who is kind and righteous. The beneficent who treats creation with kindness.

name: At-Tawwab
description: The one who constantly turns in forgiveness. The acceptor of repentance.

name: Al-Muntaqim
description: The one who victoriously avenges. The inflictor of retribution on wrongdoers.

name: Al-Afuw
description: The one who pardons all. The effacer of sins who forgives totally.

name: Ar-Ra'uf
description: The one who is full of kindness. The most kind and compassionate.

name: Malik-ul-Mulk
description: The one who owns all sovereignty. The eternal owner of all kingdoms.

name: Dhul-Jalal-wal-Ikram
meaning: The Lord of Majesty and Bounty
description: The one possessing majesty and honor. The lord of majesty and generosity.

name: Al-Muqsit
description: The one who acts with justice. The equitable who is just in all dealings.

name: Al-Jami
description: The one who brings together. The gatherer who unites all things.

name: Al-Ghani
description: The one who is rich and independent. The wealthy who is free of all needs.

name: Al-Mughni
description: The one who satisfies needs. The enricher who provides independence.

name: Al-Mani
description: The one who prevents and withholds. The defender who averts harm.

name: Ad-Darr
description: The one who creates adversity. The creator of harm for whom He wills.

name: An-Nafi
description: The one who creates benefit. The creator of good for whom He wills.

name: An-Nur
description: The one who is the light of the heavens and earth. The illuminator of all existence.

name: Al-Hadi
description: The one who provides guidance. The guide who shows the right path.

name: Al-Badi
description: The one who creates in unprecedented ways. The incomparable originator of all things.

name: Al-Baqi
description: The one who remains forever. The eternal who endures endlessly.

name: Al-Warith
description: The one who remains after all creation ceases. The ultimate inheritor of all things.

name: Ar-Rashid
meaning: The Guide to the Right Path
description: The one who guides with wisdom. The director to the right way.

name: As-Sabur
description: The one who is most patient. The most forbearing who never hastens punishment.
